moves.1. e4:
This is one of the games from my French Defence tournament. As you will see it didn't last very long. I set this tournament up as I knew nothing about the French defence, its proved to be an interesting experience.

Please feel free to comment
moves.3. Nd2: I must admit I don't really feel comfortable with this move but I wanted to see how it went
moves.3... c5 4. Ngf3 cxd4 5. Nxd4: The Gameknot database suggests exd5 is better
moves.5... Nf6 6. exd5 Qxd5 7. Nd2f3 Bc5 8. Be: the only other game in the Gameknot database that got here had Be2 here which I guess implies this is a premature move but I quite liked it and had a feeling I might gain something out of it.
moves.9... Bxe3: This is a fatal blunder, black had clearly missed the threat of the royal fork on c7

gameName: elwoos's French Defence mini-tournament Short and Sweet
